notes: [Improved] Moved release feed to Github
[Improved] Removed Invisible Captcha field
[Fixed] Fixed HTML5 validation error
[Added] Added "for" attribute to the honeypot label.
[Improved] Improved logging to capture all failed validation methods, instead of just the first failed method.
[Fixed] Fixed honeypot so unique ids are generated if multiple forms appear on the same page.
[Fixed] Fixed javascript validation issue with multiple forms on the same page.
[Added] Added Schema Version
[Added] Added Plugin icon
[Added] Added Plugin description
[Added] Added link to documentation
[Added] Added link to plugin settings
[Added] Added link to release feed
[Improved] Updated settings page display
[Added] Added support for protection during User Registration
[Improved] Added check to make sure validation only runs on front-end
[Improved] Improved checks on whether to run validation
[Improved] Various minor design and copy updates in settings area
[Fixed] Fixed issue where validation could run even when no protection methods were selected
[Added] Added Duplicate Submission spam protection method
[Added] Added Javascript spam protection method
[Added] Added an example of how each spam protection method can be tested
[Improved] Improved documentation on settings page
[Fixed] Fixed error that occurred in older versions of PHP
[Fixed] Fixed error that occurred when no settings are selected
[Fixed] Fixed display bug with plugin settings
[Added] Added support for Contact Form plugin
[Added] Added support for Guest Entries plugin
[Added] Added support for Sprout Forms plugin
[Added] Added dynamic support for Sprout Forms plugin `displayForm()` tag
[Added] Added Invisible Captcha Field Type
[Added] Added Sprout Forms front-end field support
[Added] Private Beta
